language.name: Kunama
language.area: West, Gash and Setit rivers, Sudan border and into Tigray Province. Barka south of Barentu; Marda north, northeast, and east of Barentu and in Barentu; Aimara west of Barentu; Laki-Tukura south of Aimara, west of Barka; Tika south of Laki-Tukura, west of Barka. Also in Ethiopia.
